translations: 留声机；[电子] 电唱机
用留声机灌音；用留声机放音

sentences.sentence: In the phonograph parlors, customers listened to recordings through individual ear tubes, moving from one machine to the next to hear different recorded speeches or pieces of music.
sentences.translation: 在留声机厅里，顾客通过单只耳道听录音，从一台机器转到另一台，听不同的演讲录音或音乐片段。

sentences.sentence: By the 1910s, much of the Brazilian first phonograph records are choros.
sentences.translation: 到1910年代，巴西的第一张留声机唱片大部分都是合唱团的。
